title: WallFlower Women's Luscious Curvy Bootcut Mid-Rise Insta Stretch Juniors Jeans (Standard and Plus)
description: From size 0 to 24, look and feel amazing in standard and plus-size jeans with regular, short, and long inseams. Size down for a Luscious Curvy fit. Designed for Every Body. 32" inseam, 9" front rise, 17.5" leg opening. Model is 5'9", wearing size 5.

Jeans That Hug Your Curves - WallFlower jeans for women in Insta Stretch denim are our stretchiest ever, with outstanding recovery to keep you looking amazing all day. Premium feel and endless holding power—these are your new favorite women’s jeans.

Look Fabulous - Complete your look with our curve-enhancing mid-rise jeans for women, which flatter your legs. The contoured mid-rise waistband and roomier hips and thighs eliminate gapping, so you can move with confidence.

All in the Details – These women's stretch jeans feature a classic double-button closure and a stylish kick leg opening for a cool, casual vibe. Perfect for horseback riding, school, or elevating your 90s and Y2K-inspired looks.

ECO Love - Join our journey to more eco-friendly processes for more sustainable garments. By 2026, we aim to source 50% of our cotton through the Better Cotton program—supporting water-efficient practices that benefit farmers and the environment.

The Luscious Curvy Bootcut is our throwback inspired mid rise fit in soft stretch denim. The forever flattering fit from season to season! Whether you’re looking for your go to jeans in a fresh wash or you want to try a new fit entirely, WallFlower has a little something for everyone! We are size inclusive (standard, curvy and plus), which means – great jeans for all women. Period
